meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Barbara Amster Amber Garrett Hunter Appler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7321.

td.p: Barbara Amster, a retired teacher from Warrenton, Virginia
Amber Garrett, an entertainment news editor from New York, New York
Hunter Appler, an attorney originally from Mount Airy, North Carolina (whose 3-day cash winnings total $71,400)

tr.td: GLUTEN-US MINIMUS
HOLIDAYS AROUND THE WORLD
WE RECOGNIZE THE SENATOR FROM NEW YORK
RHYMES WITH BRAINS
ACTORS IN COMMERCIALS
BOOK ENDS
(Alex: We'll give you the last lines of a work of fiction. You identify the novel for us.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Beer generally has gluten, but this hard beverage, like from Angry Orchard, does not')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Beer generally has gluten, but this hard beverage, like from Angry Orchard, does not

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_1', 'clue_J_6_1_stuck', '(Barbara: What is, uh, Harry Po--The Deathly Hallows?)

(Barbara: Part 2.)
[Alex laughs while looking over at the judges.]
(Alex: Okay. Go again.)

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

Barbara
')
